languages.text: "Да, и причина его гибели — династия фон Валанциус. На вашем месте, Абеляр, я бы готовился к затяжной войне двух родов Вольных Торговцев".
"Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."
languages.original_text: "Да, и причина его гибели — династия фон Валанциус. На вашем месте, Абеляр, я бы готовился к затяжной войне двух родов Вольных Торговцев".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

languages.text: “没错，而且他的死就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝一手造成的。如果我是你，阿贝拉德，我会做好准备，准备打赢两个行商浪人家族之间的持久战。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

traits.locale_text: “没错，而且他的死就是冯·瓦兰修斯王朝一手造成的。如果我是你，阿贝拉德，我会做好准备，准备打赢两个行商浪人家族之间的持久战。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Et la dynastie von Valancius est la raison de sa chute. À votre place, Abélard, je me préparerais à une guerre acharnée entre les maisons des deux libres-marchands. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

traits.locale_text: « Et la dynastie von Valancius est la raison de sa chute. À votre place, Abélard, je me préparerais à une guerre acharnée entre les maisons des deux libres-marchands. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Sí, y la causante de su muerte es la dinastía von Valancius. Abelard, en su lugar empezaría a prepararme para un conflicto prolongado entre ambas casas de Comerciantes Independientes».
languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, y la causante de su muerte es la dinastía von Valancius. Abelard, en su lugar empezaría a prepararme para un conflicto prolongado entre ambas casas de Comerciantes Independientes».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「うむ、奴が死んだ原因はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝にある。アベラルドよ、俺がお前の立場なら、自由開拓者の家同士で起こる長きにわたる戦争の準備をするところだ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

traits.locale_text: 「うむ、奴が死んだ原因はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝にある。アベラルドよ、俺がお前の立場なら、自由開拓者の家同士で起こる長きにわたる戦争の準備をするところだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, und die Ursache für seinen Niedergang ist die Dynastie von Valancius. Wäre ich an Eurer Stelle, Abelard, ich würde mich für einen langen Krieg zwischen den beiden Freihändler-Häusern rüsten."
languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, und die Ursache für seinen Niedergang ist die Dynastie von Valancius. Wäre ich an Eurer Stelle, Abelard, ich würde mich für einen langen Krieg zwischen den beiden Freihändler-Häusern rüsten."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

languages.text: "Evet. Ölümünün sebebi de von Valancius hanedanlığı. Yerinde olsam iki Hür Tacir hanesi arasında, uzun sürecek bir savaşa hazırlanırdım Abelard."
languages.original_text: "Yes, and the cause of his demise is the von Valancius dynasty. If I were you, Abelard, I would prepare for a protracted war between the two Rogue Trader houses."

traits.locale_text: "Evet ve yok oluşunun sebebi, von Valancius hanedanlığı. Senin yerinde olsaydım iki Hür Tacir hanesi arasında uzun sürecek bir savaşa hazırlanırdım Abelard."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
